caption: The photograph features a close-up view of small, red plants growing among green grasses. The plants are characterized by vibrant reddish-pink leaves that have a broad, somewhat rounded shape and are slightly curled. The leaves appear to have a fuzzy texture with fine white hairs visible on their surfaces, enhancing the detail and depth of the foliage. In the background, the focus blends the greenery into a soft blur, highlighting the sharp contrast of the red plants against the subdued green tones. The lighting in the photo is natural, giving the colors a rich and lively appearance. The overall composition of the image focuses on the small scale and delicate nature of ground cover in a natural, possibly wild, environment.
title: Typical tundra vegetation
